Reviews.Title: Better than the iphone
Reviews.Author: C. Robertson "Shell"
Reviews.Content: I had an iPhone before the Galaxy S II Skyrocket, and the Skyrocket blows the iPhone out of the water. Love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Love my phone
Reviews.Author: Chaseyo66
Reviews.Content: It's been a few months and my phone has held up great. Rooted with a custom ROM and works beautifully. Did have some scratching but this was in the description. Came with new back piece, battery and screen protector already applied.

Reviews.Title: I want a solution
Reviews.Author: uben quintero
Reviews.Content: and received the phone in a sealed box but not the headphones and the main chamber is damaged when starting the application says camera error, please reply on this cell need defective or if possible send the camera parts to fix. .. thanks

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT
Reviews.Author: Aneuris
Reviews.Content: PURCHASE WAS A SUCCESS, EVERYTHING COMES AS AGREED MAY RETURN TO DEALING WITH THIS PERSON, FOR ALL MY EXPECTATIONS WERE FULFILLED.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone I strongly recommend it!!!!.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Antonio Baez Liriano "Richter Belmont"
Reviews.Content: Works great, lighting fast great battery life and with android 4.1.2 jelly bean it woks wonderfully :) If you don't already own a samsung galaxy S phone then get one now!!! :)

Reviews.Title: this phone has been a real trojan horse
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: when you buy in product specifications detailing a new and free equipment for all operators, boxed with accessoriesI get used equipment, locked up and lost signal every 5 minutes one must reboot to get it back, which is useless because with a message or call received it loses the signal againI have it saved in a drawer without being able to usea very bad buy from my point of viewMario Orue

Reviews.Title: nice, its ok
Reviews.Author: Henry27
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with the item, just some detail, but I can think that its a system error...A few times the display it showed some colors lines, and the camera it shows an "camera error"...It was turned off sometimes for no reason apparently

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: Pros: Stunning Camera, Great Screen, Also has a nice slim design. And has 4G LTE and nice featuresCons: The default charger is bad and the battery is bad and call quality isn't too great

Reviews.Title: ICS Skyrocket Phone
Reviews.Author: Lester
Reviews.Content: so far excellent phone for only att unlocked service and android 4.0 ICS, really enjoy it with WI-FI keep up good work and hope the seller did good job for 5 star rate

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Rolonda Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I did not like the phone that i had purchased for the simple fact that when i got it i was so excited but once i put my sims card in it the thing wouldnt work. I went to the closest AT&T; store and i had to purchase another sims card. once it was in the phone continued to say that it was not registered to the network. The clerk at the store told me to send it back to the sender & i refused to at first so i calld AT&T; and they told me the same thing that it was defective. So I emailed the company and they were very rude saying that they tried it with several sims cards before they shipped it. Then i recieved an email stating that would be getting my money back of 348.00 but the phone was 355.00 and 360.00 with s&h; but they said not so..I still have my invoice and would gladly send it to them. I would not recommend this company to anyone..still searching for a great galaxy s2 skyrocket phone from AT&T;

Reviews.Title: Phone would not connect to the internet
Reviews.Author: K. Black
Reviews.Content: The phone would not connect to the internet. I went to an ATT store and the representative tried multiple sim cards and could not get it to connect. I sent to the phone back and have yet to receive an email about getting my refund. Do not recommend seller!
